sentences.english: Night decayed, a desk lamp, return yellow books depicting handwriting has light.
sentences.chinese: 夜闌珊，一盞檯燈下，返黃書箋筆跡已淡。

sentences.english: From the area of southeast meter disconsolate, youhen full word.
sentences.chinese: 絕域從軍計惘然，東南幽恨滿詞箋。

sentences.english: This kind of xuan paper with hidden veins adopted the processing method of "translucidus notepaper ".
sentences.chinese: 這種帶暗花的宣紙使用了“透光箋”的製作方法。

sentences.english: With his head spinning in pain, he found himself adrift on the tiny bamboo raft.
sentences.chinese: 他的頭在痛苦中旋轉着，他發現自己漂浮在小竹箋上。

sentences.english: She says she'll put it on a prescription pad, if you want.
sentences.chinese: 她說如果你需要的話，她會把它記在處方箋上。

sentences.english: He wanted more and more. So he continued on, in the little bamboo raft.
sentences.chinese: 他想得到更多，所以他坐着小竹箋繼續前行。

definition: poetic essay/taxation/to bestow on/to endow with
have as remainder/trad. variant of 剩[sheng4]
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
interpreting words/to explain the meaning of words in classic texts/to decipher an old script
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
the final (of a syllable) (Chinese phonology)/rhyme/appeal/charm/(literary) pleasant sound
